title: Card Game 2
description: Dive into the magic of "Card Game 2," your go-to sound library for crafting immersive game worlds.
longDescription:
Audio demo


Dive into the magic of "Card Game 2," your go-to sound library for crafting immersive game worlds. Imagine the thrill of epic battles and the strategic depth of magical card games, all enhanced with over 800 meticulously designed sound effects. This collection covers everything from the crackle of Fire Sigils to the subtle whispers of ancient spells, each effect available in multiple variations to keep your game’s audio fresh and engaging.


  • 842 game ready sound effects & loops in total
  • 249 sound sets
  • 1.23 GB of samples
  • Online Fantasy Card Game Sound Effects Library
  • Perfect for fantasy games, sound designers and game developers


With organized categories like user interface sounds, card movements, gameplay actions, and magical spells, you’ll find exactly what you need without the hassle. Designed for card games, RPGs, and fantasy adventures, "Card Game 2" is packed with sounds that are ready to drop into your project, making it easy for both seasoned sound designers and newcomers to create a captivating audio experience. 


Inside you’ll get to explore relatable and charming sounds in fantasy card game style like user interface, HUD, transitions, lobby sounds, card movements, gameplay actions, spells, magic, alerts, achievements, shuffles, timers, and character/card abilities. Each sound has been carefully crafted to enhance the gaming experience, whether you're working on card games, RPGs, or fantasy adventures. Each sound includes three to five variation files per set: Sound sets are a collection of similar or related sounds that are designed to add variety and realism to the soundscape of the game. By using different variations of similar sounds, game sound designers can prevent the repetition of the same sound over and over, which can quickly become boring and detract from the player's immersion.


Unlock Enchantment with Card Game 2


Whether you're crafting the epic battles of a fantasy RPG, weaving the intricate strategies of a magical card game, or conjuring any otherworldly universe, "Card Game 2" provides the perfect sound bank to enthrall and immerse. From the crackling of a Fire Sigil to the ethereal tones of ancient magic, these sounds are your spells, ready to transform your game into a legendary experience. It’s a great sound effects library for any level! From seasoned sound designer or a game development newcomer, "Card Game 2" will fast-track your project, provide a complete cache of polished sound design with variation files, making it easier than ever to create your game audio soundtrack. 


UCS Compliant & Soundminer Metadata


All sound effects labeling is UCS compliant and is organized into categories to make it easier to navigate with understandable folder structures: Ability, Achievement, Action, Alert, Ambience, Card, Card Status, Counters, Music, Play, Transition, UI & more. On top of UCS, Card Game 2 – sound sets feature extensive metadata embedded in the files using soundminer metadata to help you find the right sound at the right time as well.


Product details:

  • 842 game ready sound effects & loops in total
  • 1.23 GB of samples
  • Each sound set comes with 3-5 variations files 
  • Online Fantasy Card Game Sound Effects Library
  • Perfect for fantasy games, sound designers and game developers
  • 249 sound sets
  • Includes embedded Soundminer metadata
  • UCS Compliant
  • 68 Abilities 
  • 112 Achievements
  • 84 Game Actions
  • 111 Alerts
  • 36 Ambience Loops
  • 53 Card SFX & Foley
  • 40 Card Status
  • 17 Card Counter / Timers
  • 20 Music Loops
  • 132 Play Card SFX
  • 25 Transitions
  • 144 UX / UI
  • All sound effects are youtube friendly & royalty free
  • RTU-OTB (Ready to be used out of the box)
  • Works with All DAW’s
